t: Amazon's new Ocelot chip brings us closer to building a practical quantum computer
s: New 'Ocelot' chip uses scalable architecture for reducing error correction by up to 90% and accelerating the development of real-world quantum computing applications.

t: qubits | AWS Quantum Technologies Blog
s: Exciting news for the quantum computing community! Amazon Braket has just onboarded Rigetti’s newest 84-qubit superconducting quantum processor, Ankaa-2. This device offers faster gate times, improved fidelities, and 24/7 availability.

t: Amazon unveils quantum chip, aiming to shave years off development time | Reuters
s: February 27, 2025 - Amazon Web Services on Thursday showed a quantum computing chip with new technology that it hopes will shave as much as five years off its effort to build a commercially useful quantum computer.

t: Amazon Braket – Get Started with Quantum Computing | Amazon Web Services

t: Amazon.com: Qubits Logo T-Shirt T-Shirt : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry
Amazon Braket Quantum Computers - AWS
s: IQM's quantum computers are universal, gate-based machines based on superconducting qubits. Among many physical platforms, superconducting quantum hardware excels both in scalability and control, making it a strong contender for fault-tolerant quantum computing.
